snippet: The measure would block new rules issued in January that would significantly ease travel restrictions to Cuba and allow regularly scheduled flights for the first time.
abstract: House Republicans vote 247-176 to keep restrictions on Americans trying to travel to Cuba; provision in transportation funding bill is setback to attempts by Obama administration to relax relations.
lead_paragraph: The measure would block new rules issued in January that would significantly ease travel restrictions to Cuba and allow regularly scheduled flights for the first time.

headline.main: G.O.P.-Led House Votes to Keep Curbs on American Travel to Cuba
headline.print_headline: G.O.P.-Led House Votes to Keep Curbs on American Travel to Cuba
